action.action-desc: Mr. Burchett (for himself, Mr. Cohen, and Mr. Green of Tennessee) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

form.official-title: To require certain meetings of the Tennessee Valley Authority to be transparent and open to the public, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Tennessee Valley Authority Transparency Act of 2022.
Section 2(g)(2) of the Tennessee Valley Authority Act of 1933 is amended to read as follows:

subparagraph.text: The Board shall meet at least 4 times each year.
The Board shall, with respect to any meeting of the Board, a committee of the Board, or a subcommittee of the Board for which a vote is not scheduledâ€”

clause.text: provide public notice of no fewer than 6 calendar days, through the website of the Board, of any such meeting; and
make publicly available the minutes and summaries of any such meeting.

subparagraph.text: Subparagraph (B)(ii) shall not apply if the chairman of the Board designates a meeting as an emergency special meeting.
